Mpuono, ma ọ bụ Mpuun, bụ asụsụ Bantu nke ọtụtụ narị puku mmadụ na-asụ na Democratic Republic of Congo.
Olumba ndị a gụnyere Mpuono, Mpuun (Mbuun, Kimbuun, Gimbunda).
Haller sụgharịrị Oziọma abụọ, ha abụọ bụ nke Mission de Mangungu
E bipụtara Oziọma Jọn na 1935, dị ka Lasang Labve la afun kangi Yone; na Oziọma Matiu na 1951, dị ka Lasag Labve lafun Matayo
Ọ bụ Société Biblique Britannique et Étrangère (British and Foreign Bible Society) bipụtara ndị a
E bipụtara nchịkọta ilu nwere nsụgharị na nkọwa asụsụ French.
